#include <bits/stdc++.h>
typedef long long ll;

using namespace std;

ll t,n,q,a[26],x;
string s;

int main()
{
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		memset(a,0,sizeof a);
		cin>>s;
		cin>>n>>q;
		for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			a[s[i]-'a']+=n;
		}
		while(q--)
		{
			cin>>x;
			if(x>n*s.length())cout<<"-1\n";
			else{
				int i=0,h=0;
				while(h<x)
				{
					h+=a[i];i++;
				}
				cout<<char(i-1+'a')<<endl;
			}
		}
	}
}
